attributes.review: this app hacked my phone and deleted all of my information. i also found ZERO dollars in my bank account after this and the bank statement said “an oompa loompa raided your bank account!!” i will NEVER EVER redownload this app because it is a SCAM. take it down or you don’t know what’s right apple. this app is HARMFUL FOR OUR WORLD. don’t forget to live laugh love baybie🍃🤍😊✨💕👁👄👁😍
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app. I opened the app, and then Karen started to ask for my manager. She complained about my battery percentage. Her husband Ken appeared and was backing her up. It took me an hour to get those two to leave me alone. All in all, it was a horrible app with atrocious service. She wasn’t even wearing a mask. I do not recommend to download this app.

😷😷😷😷😷😷
attributes.title: WEaR YoUR MaSk KAREN 😷

attributes.review: do not recommend this app whatsoever. horrible glitches come along with this app once it is downloaded. also, took a while to download onto my phone. really messed up my phone and i’m pretty sure the damage is irreversible. now i have to buy a new phone! $1000 for a phone down the drain. the joe biden 2020 app on the other hand... wow!!! it is very sleek and professional. haven’t experienced any glitches so far. a beautifully crafted app and i can tell a lot of time was put into creating it. very thought out! #biden2020 is the way to go!! 🥰💙
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: Quite possibly the worst app I’ve downloaded it takes forever to download and honestly when I finally got it to download I tried to open it but it wouldn’t for at least for a day till finally it opened at like 2 am out of no where if I could give it a 0 star I would
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.title: HORRIFIC

attributes.review: hi i am writing as a spirit. i downloaded the app and since im a woman, lgbtq, and a minority i got shocked by electricity and then seized to death. i died. i am now a ghost. please tell my 783 children that i love them. they have been lost by ICE. 😔 pls save urself time and dont download this app unless you’re a racist, homophobic, sexist, rapist, white man. otherwise you’ll end up like me : a ghost. 👻 rip.
attributes.title: killed me

attributes.review: this app caused a virus in my phone, in which every time i typed the word ‘trump’ it autocorrected to ‘fascist’ very annoying i must say. along with the fact that this app took 3 days to download, as soon as i downloaded it, every single emoji that was blue was removed from my phone. i would not recommend you download this app.
attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

attributes.review: This might be the worst app on the app store I can believe apple has kept it up so long. It gave me 3000 viruses on my phone ( also the number of children that ICE has ”lost”. I'm very disappointed in Apple and I will think twice when choosing who to purchase from again

attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: This app is a gateway to SPAM. I have never had any spam popping up in my phone on my calendar and reminders and email until I downloaded this app. It’s absolutely awful. It’s barely functions, you can’t find your way around the app, and it takes up so much data and storage.
attributes.title: Awful, SPAM
